update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: Data collection interval, measured in seconds.

dsn.title: DSN
dsn.description: Postgres server Data Source Name in [key/value string](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/libpq-connect.html#LIBPQ-CONNSTRING-KEYWORD-VALUE) or [URI](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/libpq-connect.html#LIBPQ-CONNSTRING-URIS) format.

collect_databases_matching.title: Database selector
collect_databases_matching.description: Configuration for monitoring specific databases using [Netdata simple patterns](https://github.com/netdata/netdata/tree/master/src/libnetdata/simple_pattern#readme). If left empty, no database metrics will be collected.

max_db_tables.title: Table limit
max_db_tables.description: Table metrics will not be collected for databases that have more tables than the limit. Set to 0 for no limit.

max_db_indexes.title: Index limit
max_db_indexes.description: Index metrics will not be collected for databases that have more indexes than the limit. Set to 0 for no limit.

transaction_time_histogram.title: Transaction time histogram
transaction_time_histogram.description: Buckets for transaction time histogram in milliseconds.

query_time_histogram.title: Query time histogram
query_time_histogram.description: Buckets for query time histogram in milliseconds.
